title: Morning Reflections
content: Started my day with 10 minutes of meditation. I'm learning to appreciate these quiet moments before the day gets busy. Setting an intention to be more present today.
Grateful for my morning coffee, the supportive text from my friend, and the beautiful sunshine streaming through my window. Small moments of joy make the biggest difference.

title: Weekly Review
content: This week had its ups and downs, but I'm proud of how I handled the challenges. Made progress on my fitness goals and had some great conversations with friends. Learning to celebrate small wins.
Thankful for my health, my family's support, and the opportunity to learn new things every day. Even during difficult times, there's always something to appreciate.

title: Study Session Success
content: Had a productive study session today. Using the Pomodoro technique really helps with focus. Feeling more confident about the upcoming exam. Time management is definitely improving!

title: Infosys Drive
content: Attended the infosys drive, and got to know the type for DSA Questions they ask.
Grateful for the opportunity to attend the project expo, where I learned a lot of things.
